titleStmt.title: The Following collections or pious little treatises together with the Rule of S. Clare and declarations upon it, are printed for the use of the English Poor Clares in Ayre an index whereof begin's in the sequent page.
titleStmt.author: Clare, of Assisi, Saint, 1194-1253. Regula. English.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
